categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Eradicator was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer that served in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. In 0 ABY, it was in the process of impounding a starship near the world of Mon Torri when the Millennium Falcon came out of hyperspace. After the Battle of Endor, Reagal Eron served as the Star Destroyer's chief gunnery officer.
